entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SqlString comparison regression bug #99507
  • Provide a method to send PosixSignal to the Process. #99506
  • Using TypeBuilder as a generic type parameter throws NotSupportedException in AssemblyBuilder created by DefinePersistedAssembly #99505
  • Native AOT SOS debugging on MacOS isn't working #99503
    9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] SemaphoreSlimTests.RunSemaphoreSlimTest1_WaitAsync_NegativeCases deadlock #99501
    9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] Deadlock in TaskCoverage.Coverage.CancellationTokenRegitration #99500
    9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] Deadlock in TCValidateAfterAddInvalidSchema.AddValid_Import_Include_Redefine #99499
    9.0.0
  • Transactional File Manager #99498
  • Assert in CounterGroup.OnEventSourceCommand after trying to run BDN x86 #99497
  • Runtime doesn't abort after first SIGABRT sent to process #99495
  • [HTTP/2] Reading data assert #99494
    9.0.0
  • [Wasm Runtime Pack] `<GenerateJSModuleManifest>false</GenerateJSModuleManifest>` should be done in a props file #99491
  • Overflows are ignored in some cases when checked-converting from `Int128` to SignedInteger #99489

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: Mark WeakReference Constructors `target` Parameter as Nullable #99496
  • No way to avoid bounds checks when multiple spans are involved #97285
    9.0.0
  • SeekableDeviceFileStreamStandaloneConformanceTests test failed with overlapped error in CI #97133
  • "Unexpected end of archive" while unzipping test assets #96627
  • [netstandard2.1] Enum.GetValues gap #99488

PullRequests

Created

  • Be more liberal when detecting cgroup version #99508
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Always keep global symbols on ApplePlatforms #99504
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [Http/2] Fix handling of effectively empty DATA frame #99502
    area-System.Net.Http
  • basic support for TCP fast open #99490
    area-System.Net.Sockets, new-api-needs-documentation

Merged

  • [mono] Fix function prototype in jiterpreter #99492
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • List exact regs killed by ByRefWriteBarrier on AMD64 #99134
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [mono] Fix warnings in s390x-specific code #99493
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Share EventSource QCall definitions between NAOT and CoreCLR #99441
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing

Updated

  • JIT: Add pred block iterator that tolerates pred list modifications #99466
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Getting vxsort working on Linux amd64 #98712
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix JitOptRepeat #94250
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [CoreCLR and native AOT] `UnsafeAccessorAttribute` supports generic parameters #99468
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, runtime-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Rewrite math jit helpers to managed code #98858
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Implement swift lowering algorithm in Mono's type system #99439
    area-Interop-mono
  • Some System.Decimal performance improvements #99212
    area-System.Numerics
  • [browser][MT] dedicated io thread #99422
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] fix various issues and enable System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript.Tests #99000
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Create a managed implementation of assembly binder #91400
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, community-contribution
  • missing opportunities in constant folding around bitwise ops #99136
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • NativeAOT: Add win-x86 support #99372
    arch-x86, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix AsyncVoidMethodBuilder race condition around SynchronizationContext #99461
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices
